title: Following the Map
description: In Following the Map, Mom gives Kelly a map and a compass to use to locate her birthday surprise. High-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed illustrations support readers, and they will have the opportunity to sequence events as well as to ask and answer questions as they read this fun-filled story about following a map.
reviewWords: compass, east, map, north, south, west
grammar: Past-Tense Verbs                : Identify and use past-tense verbs
wordWork: Concept Words                : Identify and use number words
